config.name: Hubspot-Contacts
config.description:
HubSpot is a marketing software as a service company provides software for businesses to coordinate their online marketing efforts.
Purpose of this action is to push form data to create contacts in Hubspot account.
config.help:
HubSpot API keys and Access token both are different terms.
API Keys are not available to all customers.
You can generate your hubspot API Key at https://app.hubspot.com/keys/get
Please contact your account manager if your portal is ineligible for API access.
Hubspot-Contacts action requires cURL to be installed on your server.
